overview:
Henrik Lawaetz comes from the position of Managing Director and Founder of Medicon Valley Capital, which he established in January 2000.

Lawaetz is a Medical Doctor (1981 University of Copenhagen) specialized in pharmaceutical medicine at the University of Wales (MFPM in 1991 in the UK) and holds an Executive MBA from SIMI (Scandinavian International Management Institute in Copenhagen).

From 1981 to 1987, Lawaetz was a hospital physician, mainly in internal medicine in Denmark and Sweden. In 1984 he established the first company in Denmark in the field of preventive health examinations and care (LTC â€“ LÃ¦gernes Test Center) and acted as its part-time CEO until 1990. Lawaetz has since been Chairman of the Board of this company.
